channel.title: Frankfurt on 48 Hours – City Guides for Fast Trips
channel.description: Recent content in Frankfurt on 48 Hours – City Guides for Fast Trips

item.title: 48 Hours in Frankfurt
item.description: Frankfurt mixes old Germany with a skyline of glass towers. The city moves on finance, trade fairs, and Apfelwein. Two days give enough time to see medieval squares, museums on the river, and the markets that locals love.
